body:
This post is for tell How many team have you been in Avicus? It´s  mostly for remember the teams that you were, remember the old times.

I was in 5 teams: CookieKillers - Vincible - Ethernal Cross - Sagrevyum - Proxy and actually i´m on Necromacy.
